option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?> <BorderPane fx:id="rootPane" style="-fx-background-color: black;" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml" fx:controller="cloud.dest.bms.demo.SlideshowController"> <top> <ToolBar fx:id="toolBar"> <Button text="Choose Folder" onAction="#onChooseFolder" /> <Label text="Interval (s):" /> <Spinner fx:id="intervalSpinner" prefWidth="80" /> <Button text="Start" onAction="#onStart" /> <Button text="Stop" onAction="#onStop" /> <Button text="Refresh" onAction="#onManualRefresh" /> <Button text="Shuffle" onAction="#onShuffle" /> <Button fx:id="fullScreenButton" text="Fullscreen" onAction="#onToggleFullscreen" /> <Button text="About" onAction="#onAbout" /> </ToolBar> </top> <left> <ListView fx:id="thumbList" prefWidth="220" /> </left> <center> <StackPane fx:id="centerPane"> <ImageView fx:id="imageView" preserveRatio="true" fitWidth="800" fitHeight="600" /> <Label fx:id="placeholderLabel" text="Click 'Choose Folder' to select a folder. Images inside it and its subfolders will play here." wrapText="true" maxWidth="600" style="-fx-text-fill: #777; -fx-font-size: 18; -fx-alignment: center;" /> </StackPane> </center> <bottom> <HBox fx:id="statusBar" spacing="14" style="-fx-padding:4; -fx-background-color:#222; -fx-alignment: CENTER_LEFT;"> <Label text="Files:" style="-fx-text-fill: white;" /> <Label fx:id="fileCountLabel" text="0" style="-fx-text-fill: white;" /> <Label text="|" style="-fx-text-fill: #555;" /> <Label fx:id="statusLabel" text="Idle" style="-fx-text-fill: white;" /> </HBox> </bottom> <padding> <Insets top="5" right="5" bottom="5" left="5" /> </padding> </BorderPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?> <BorderPane fx:id="rootPane" style="-fx-background-color: black;" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml" fx:controller="cloud.dest.bms.demo.SlideshowController"> <top> <ToolBar fx:id="toolBar"> <Button text="Choose Folder" onAction="#onChooseFolder" /> <Label text="Interval (s):" /> <Spinner fx:id="intervalSpinner" prefWidth="80" /> <Button text="Start" onAction="#onStart" /> <Button text="Stop" onAction="#onStop" /> <Button text="Refresh" onAction="#onManualRefresh" /> <Button text="Shuffle" onAction="#onShuffle" /> <Button fx:id="fullScreenButton" text="Fullscreen" onAction="#onToggleFullscreen" /> <Button text="About" onAction="#onAbout" /> </ToolBar> </top> <left> <ListView fx:id="thumbList" prefWidth="220" /> </left> <center> <StackPane fx:id="centerPane"> <ImageView fx:id="imageView" preserveRatio="true" fitWidth="800" fitHeight="600" /> <Label fx:id="placeholderLabel" text="Click 'Choose Folder' to select a folder. Images inside it and its subfolders will play here." wrapText="true" maxWidth="600" style="-fx-text-fill: #777; -fx-font-size: 18; -fx-alignment: center;" /> </StackPane> </center> <bottom> <HBox fx:id="statusBar" spacing="14" style="-fx-padding:4; -fx-background-color:#222; -fx-alignment: CENTER_LEFT;"> <Label text="Files:" style="-fx-text-fill: white;" /> <Label fx:id="fileCountLabel" text="0" style="-fx-text-fill: white;" /> <Label text="|" style="-fx-text-fill: #555;" /> <Label fx:id="statusLabel" text="Idle" style="-fx-text-fill: white;" /> </HBox> </bottom> <padding> <Insets top="5" right="5" bottom="5" left="5" /> </padding> </BorderPane>
